_INSTRUCTIONS_FOR_CASCADE.mission: Manually investigate each person using thoughtful analysis, not automatic pattern matching
_INSTRUCTIONS_FOR_CASCADE.workflow: Phase 4B-2: Iterative probing of unenriched Fathom participants
methodology: 1. ANALYZE NAME STRUCTURE: Identify person vs org components, clean formatting
2. SEARCH AIRTABLE: Try full name + word variations, check org field for context
3. SEARCH GMAIL: Run gmail_research.py, look for mentions/context/relationships
4. CROSS-REFERENCE: Compare Airtable org field with name, verify Gmail matches

decision_criteria.merge: High confidence match (>85%) with corroborating evidence from multiple sources
decision_criteria.add_to_airtable: Real person, ERA-related work, not currently in Airtable
decision_criteria.ignore: Not ERA-related, organizational junk, or duplicate
decision_criteria.needs_more_info: Insufficient evidence to make confident decision

output_format.example:
🔍 Probing [Name]...
1. Analysis: [structure]
2. Airtable: [results]
3. Gmail: [findings]
4. Cross-ref: [verification]
RECOMMENDATION: [action]
CONFIDENCE: [0-100]%
EVIDENCE: [list]
METHOD: [approach]

items_to_probe.name: Duane Norris
items_to_probe.why_flagged: Not found in Airtable | Found in Gmail - likely real person

items_to_probe.name: MOSES, GFCCA
items_to_probe.why_flagged: Not found in Airtable | Found in Gmail - likely real person | Contains special chars/org names - ambiguous
